subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[reconnoitre]]; to [[scout]]
# to [[observe]]; to [[survey]]
# to [[wait]] for; to [[await]]
# to [[respectfully]] [[await]]
# to [[visit]]; to [[send]] one's [[respect]]s to
# to [[wait on]]; to [[attend]] to; to [[take]] [[care]] of
# to [[forecast]]; to [[predict]] (by divination)
# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[scout]]; [[lookout]]; [[vanguard]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} {{zh-alt-form|堠|[[fortress]]}}
# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[official]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[posthouse]]; [[station]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[ancient]] [[time]] [[unit]] composed of [[five]] [[day]]s
# [[climate]]; [[season]]
# [[omen]]; [[sign]]; [[portent]]
# {{lb|zh|TCM}} to [[examine]] (pulse)
# {{lb|zh|TCM}} [[medical]] [[sign]] and [[symptom]]
# {{lb|zh|dialectal}} to [[pay]] for (a bill)
